extendedInfo.description: *** Awesome deal on this week! Get $5 USD for FREE ***Install the game and get an extended 13x13 field to expand your Megapolis and 30 Megabucks for free!The #1 citybuilder game in more than 20 countries with over 10M downloads! One million play every day!  Tablets supported. Enjoy the incredible game experience on large screen!Manage finances of your own city, design and develop primary infrastructure:* airports* railway stations* seaports* oil and gas mining* wind, solar and atomic power plantsRegular content updates and city events will add excitement to the life of your Megapolis. Trade materials and build alliances with neighbors. Challenge your friends to create most gorgeous and successful city.FEATURES:* Awesome realistic 3D graphics* World famous architecture from ancient to modern* More than 500 buildings and sites, hundreds of construction materials* Teamwork with your neighbors* City expansion both on land and over the sea* Challenging tasks, rewards and achievements

reviews.title: Fun game, but...
reviews.comment: The game revolves around in game purchases and can make projects way to big which then causes neighbors to stop playing. Other than that i enjoy it, even if it takes a lot of time to be successful... No way to turn off notifications, about ready to uninstall this game for that reason alone, i can\'t take it anymore!!!
reviews.author: Matthew E. Parrott

reviews.title: Enjoyable!
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this game...I wish I could interact and add friends more easily....It would also be a better game if dollars were easier to achieve.
reviews.author: Lesley Hanesworth

reviews.title: A Must have
reviews.comment: One of the best games out. top notch for the graphics and playability so much fun I just can\'t leave my city.
reviews.author: James Noordhof

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: Entertaining and very creative. To be able to create and build your own city It\'s awesome!
reviews.author: Alba Perez

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: This game doesnt have much to complain about. But, I feel like if you had the option to set priorities on the projects you were building would be great. To be able to choose which construction projects you want finished first would be great
reviews.author: Andrew Jolicoeur

reviews.title: Gonna download it
reviews.comment: Cool trailer. Made me feel like download it hope its cool but ina give it an Excellent
reviews.author: said joseph

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Fun game, one of the best app revenue bits, needs work, like all of them, needs to focus more on fun than making money..
reviews.author: Travis Raines

reviews.title: OK if you have lots of real coin.
reviews.comment: Game is really cool but unless you are willing to spend lots of real $ on megabucks you won\'t go far. It\'s a money suck game and they make the cool stuff unattainable unless you drop real coin... boo to that! Would be so much better if they just made you buy the game for say, $10 and gave you the ability to have everything.
reviews.author: Arron Ayotte

reviews.title: Great graphics highly addictive ,  hard to expand
reviews.comment: On galaxy s4 smooth graphics looks great, nice detail.
reviews.author: Jaime Eslava

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Good game very enjoy able the graphics are amazing
reviews.author: Peyton Creasey

reviews.title: Megapolis
reviews.comment: Awesome!  I love this game so much it is out of this world awesome with its graphics and its kept up to date.
reviews.author: LaTricia Amis

reviews.title: Good game but...
reviews.comment: Why is it that when I switch from sq to fb my progress isnt transferred over with it? For some reason if im connected to fb im on level 9 but on sq im level 15? Shouldn\'t that progress transfer from one to the other when im using the same device? Would def be 4-5 star if not for that issue. It is a very addicting game and hard to put down
reviews.author: tim Helbig

reviews.title: Brilliant game would recommend it to everybody who likes 3d games
reviews.comment: Fantastic games, great graphics. Very addictive
reviews.author: Victoria Marsh

reviews.title: So Far...
reviews.comment: Have just been playing for 10 minutes and I find it interesting. I like creating cities, Woodlands, etc., so, give me a couple of more days and the rating may go higher. I NEVER BUY ANYTHING, so I\'m sure things may go at a snails pace. That\'ll determine if I continue or uninstall.
reviews.author: Diane Minich

reviews.comment: Will not download
reviews.author: Connor Buehler

reviews.title: Long time to complete buildings
reviews.comment: My app deletes wen my battery dies (at least once a day) very annoying S2. Only started when the pleasure island update came
reviews.author: Conor Murphy

reviews.title: ITS LIKE MY DREAM!!!!
reviews.comment: Wow.....am I dreaming......its like im the president then im growing a city or country....good job.....this is amazing..........I wish u could put some weathers so it coulb be reality....
reviews.author: Jennyvi Cabaneros

reviews.title: Unable to delete FB neighbors
reviews.comment: Love this game; however, a former Facebook friend, who doesn\'t play anymore, still appears on my neighbors list even after deleting and unfriending.  Please help.  It is annoying to still see them.  Thank you.
reviews.author: Steven Moreno

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Amazing love it its better then farmville or another games get it NOW its really good u will loyve it as welllllll
reviews.author: Lucy May

reviews.title: Makers are too concerned about monetary gains
reviews.comment: Very good game and very addicting but the makers make it hard to continue playing the game without the player spending real money on megabucks! Megabucks need to be earned a little more easier in my opinion
reviews.author: Andrew Bargmann
